author: tomdz
msg: Added script mode to the SQL generation to allow platforms to create different SQL depending on whether it will be executed directly via JDBC or output to a file
Added Oracle support for SQL script generation which uses a forward slash to delimit PL/SQL code

author: cam
msg: 1. Implemented support for the 'keyPoints' and 'rotate' attributes on
'animateMotion' elements, as well as for child 'mpath' elements.
2. Implemented paced animation for the other animation elements.
